com.sendev.databasemanager.DatabaseManager

    • Uses of DatabaseManager in com.sendev.databasemanager

      Methods in com.sendev.databasemanager that return DatabaseManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DatabaseManager DatabaseFactory.createNewInstance(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
      Creates a new Database Manager(DBM) instance, allowing you to communicate with databases easier, using the DBM also gives you access to the Database Schema and Query Builder which makes it even easier to create, delete, modify and update database records.
      Constructors in com.sendev.databasemanager with parameters of type DatabaseManager 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(DatabaseManager dbm, ConnectionLevel level, Database connection)
      Creates a database connection for the DBM connection container, allowing the container to sort and managed the connection from it's connection level.
      ConnectionContainer(DatabaseManager dbm)
      Creates a new database connection container instance, making it easier to store, manage and use the database connections parsed to the Database Manager.
